blade.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon
blade.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The blade of the knife flashed in the moonlight.
blade.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the flat wide part of an object that pushes against air or water
blade.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: the metal part on the bottom of an ice-skate
blade.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a thin curved piece of a strong material that someone with the lower part of their leg missing attaches to their leg in order to run
